home.meta_title: Steam Cookie Clicker | Start Your Cookie Empire
home.meta_description: Play Cookie Clicker on Steam - The Ultimate Idle Game. Start your cookie empire, unlock achievements, and become the ultimate cookie master.
home.intro: Cookie Clicker is an addictive idle game where you click to produce cookies and build your empire. Here are the main features:

latest_codes.title: Latest Cookie Clicker Updates
latest_codes.code1: New Building: Fractal Engine - Produces cookies through dimensional manipulation.
latest_codes.code2: New Achievement: Cookie Singularity - Reach 1 quintillion cookies per second.
latest_codes.update_note: Stay updated with the latest Cookie Clicker features by bookmarking this page!

how_to_redeem.title: How to Use Cookie Clicker Features
how_to_redeem.intro: Maximizing your cookie production is simple. Follow these steps:
how_to_redeem.step1: Start by clicking the big cookie.
how_to_redeem.note: Remember to check for Golden Cookies regularly for bonus effects.

tips.title: Tips for Cookie Clicker Success
tips.tip1: Always watch for Golden Cookies appearing.
tips.tip2: Invest in the most efficient buildings first.
tips.tip3: Use the Stock Market during Frenzy effects.
tips.conclusion: With these tips, you'll be a cookie master in no time!

item1.title: Grandma's Kitchen
item1.description: Recruit an army of grandmas to bake treats for you.

item2.title: Magical Farms
item2.description: Plant and harvest magical seeds in vast fields.

item3.title: Ancient Mines
item3.description: Dig deep underground to discover precious resources.

item4.description: Industrial-scale facilities that mass produce goods.

item5.title: Investment Banks

item6.title: Ancient Temples

cta.title: Get ready for an exciting twist on Cookie Clicker!
cta.description: Dive into an idle game where every click counts. Build, upgrade, and expand your way to production mastery in this thrilling adventure!

item1.question: How to start Cookie Clicker?
item1.answer: Simply click the "Get Started" button to begin your adventure.

item2.question: Is Cookie Clicker free to play?
item2.answer: Yes! Cookie Clicker is completely free to play.

item3.question: How does Cookie Clicker save progress?
item3.answer: Cookie Clicker automatically saves your game progress.

item4.question: What is "Ascension" in Cookie Clicker?
item4.answer: In Cookie Clicker, "Ascension" resets progress to earn Prestige Levels and Heavenly Chips for permanent upgrades. Perform your first ascension after reaching 365 Prestige Levels for a significant boost.

item5.question: How to unlock minigames in Cookie Clicker?
item5.answer: Unlock minigames by upgrading buildings with sugar lumps. Once upgraded, a button will appear in the building's menu. Click it to access the minigame.

reviews.title: Cookie Clicker Loved by people worldwide.

item2.author: - IdleGamer

item3.title: So Addictive!
item3.content: Started playing yesterday, and I can't put it down. The upgrades are so satisfying!
